entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
